title: ST_MAKEGEOMPOINT , ST_GEOMPOINT | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Constructs a GEOMETRY object that represents a Point with the specified longitude and latitude.
A REAL that represents the longitude.
A REAL that represents the latitude.
The function returns a value of type GEOMETRY.
ST_GEOMPOINT is an alias for ST_MAKEGEOMPOINT.

For examples, see Examples comparing the GEOGRAPHY and GEOMETRY data types. The examples use the
ST_GEOMPOINT alias.
